channel.title: Object training don't work

item.title: Object training don't work
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

ok, so i make a case :-

case 2513:

if (objectID == 2513) {
if (playerHasItem(10003)) {
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You shoot at the target.");
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(426);
addSkillXP((12*playerLevel[4]), 4);
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage("Here is a dark bow to train with =]");
actionTimer = 1;
addItem(10003, 1);
}
     }
          }
break;

It compiles, but then when i click the target in-game it dioes nothing.

i also tried:-

case 2513:
sendMessage("Hiya, it works - yay!");
break;

That don’t work neither, so what’s wrong?

Read full topic
